attributes.action: Stop attendance at school during the second wave of pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Because the children are spreading the virus through the schools and taking it home to spread to their  family members. There are people who are vulnerable but not classed as clinically vulnerable, its unfair to discriminate against those people who have other health conditions but are not able to be  protected  or protect them selves against the virus
attributes.background: to stop all school children apart from the exception of frontline workers family's the children are clearly spreading the virus through the schools

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846
